Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur. ## Inline HTML elements HTML defines a long list of available inline tags, a complete list of which can be found on the [Mozilla Developer Network](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element). - **To bold text**, use `**To bold text**`. - *To italicize text*, use `*To italicize text*`. - Abbreviations, like HTML should be defined like this `*[HTML]: HyperText Markup Language`. - Citations, like — Mark otto, should use ``. - ~~Deleted~~ text should use `~~deleted~~` and inserted text should use ``. - Superscript text uses `` and subscript text uses ``. Most of these elements are styled by browsers with few modifications on our part. ## Heading 2 Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue rutrum faucibus dolor auctor.
